AT.name: Kuru Kuru Kururin™
AT.description: Halte deine Hände ruhig und stähle deine Nerven. Mach dich gefasst auf eines der anspruchsvollsten Puzzle-Actionspiele, das je erschaffen wurde. Kuru Kuru Kururin übergibt dir die Kontrolle über einen rotierenden Helikopter, der sorgsam durch immer schwierigere und engere labyrinthartige Level gesteuert werden muss. Weiche Wänden und Hindernissen aus, um nicht wertvolle Zeit oder Versuche zu verlieren, während du versuchst, das Ziel zu erreichen. Alles fängt sehr einfach an, doch es dauert nicht lange, bis du es mit sich bewegenden Kolben, schwebenden Stacheln und einer Vielzahl weiterer Gefahren zu tun bekommen wirst. Kuru Kuru Kururin ist leicht zu verstehen, aber man kann es nur schwer wieder weglegen!

AU.name: Kuru Kuru Kururin™
AU.description: Steady your hands and steel your nerves for one of the most challenging puzzle-action games ever created. Kuru Kuru Kururin puts you in control of a rotating helicopter that must be carefully manoeuvred through increasingly tight and tricky labyrinthine levels. Avoid the walls and obstacles, or you’ll lose precious time and lives, as you try to reach the goal. It starts simple but soon you’ll be facing moving pistons, floating spikes and all manner of dangers. Kuru Kuru Kururin is easy to pick up but impossible to put down!

BG.name: Kuru Kuru Kururin™
BG.description: Steady your hands and steel your nerves for one of the most challenging puzzle-action games ever created. Kuru Kuru Kururin puts you in control of a rotating helicopter that must be carefully manoeuvred through increasingly tight and tricky labyrinthine levels. Avoid the walls and obstacles, or you’ll lose precious time and lives, as you try to reach the goal. It starts simple but soon you’ll be facing moving pistons, floating spikes and all manner of dangers. Kuru Kuru Kururin is easy to pick up but impossible to put down!

BE.name: Kuru Kuru Kururin™
BE.description: Ne tremblez pas et mettez vos nerfs à l'épreuve avec ce jeu de réflexion et d'action parmi les plus exigeants jamais créés. Kuru Kuru Kururin vous donne le contrôle d'un hélicoptère qui tourne que vous devrez guider dans des niveaux labyrinthiques toujours plus étroits et difficiles. Dirigez-vous vers l'arrivée en évitant les murs et les obstacles pour ne pas perdre de précieuses vies et secondes. La difficulté augmente et vous vous retrouverez vite face à des pistons en mouvement, des piques flottantes et de nombreux autres dangers. Se lancer dans Kuru Kuru Kururin est facile, mais s'arrêter est impossible !

ES.name: Kuru Kuru Kururin™
ES.description: Demuestra que tienes nervios de acero y la mano firme con uno de los juegos de puzle y acción más exigentes de todos los tiempos. En Kuru Kuru Kururin controlarás una hélice giratoria que tendrás que dirigir con precisión por complicados y estrechos laberintos. Encuentra el camino hasta la meta, pero evita tocar las paredes y los obstáculos o perderás vidas y preciosos segundos. Aunque al principio parezca fácil, pronto te encontrarás enfrentándote a pistones móviles, puntas flotantes y todo tipo de peligros. Comenzar a jugar a Kuru Kuru Kururin es muy sencillo, ¡lo difícil es dejarlo!

IT.name: Kuru Kuru Kururin™
IT.description: Mano ferma e nervi saldi... Preparati ad affrontare il gioco più cervellotico che sia mai stato inventato! Con Kuru Kuru Kururin devi manovrare un'elica con minuziosa perizia e superare intricati labirinti. Fatti strada verso la meta evitando accuratamente pareti e ostacoli, o perderai tempo e vite preziose. All'inizio sembra semplice, ma presto ti troverai a districarti tra pistoni in movimento, sfere a spuntoni e ogni sorta di pericolo. È facile appassionarsi a Kuru Kuru Kururin... il difficile è smettere!

NL.name: Kuru Kuru Kururin™
NL.description: Er is geen plaats voor nervositeit en trillende handen in deze zeer uitdagende behendigheidsgame. In Kuru Kuru Kururin bestuur je een roterende helikopter die uiterst voorzichtig door een labyrint met steeds nauwer wordende gangen moet worden geloosd. Op weg naar het einddoel moet je muren en obstakels ontwijken, anders verlies je kostbare tijd en levens. De beginlevels zijn eenvoudig genoeg, maar de moeilijkheidsgraad neemt toe naarmate er meer obstakels op je pad komen.

NZ.name: Kuru Kuru Kururin™
NZ.description: Steady your hands and steel your nerves for one of the most challenging puzzle-action games ever created. Kuru Kuru Kururin puts you in control of a rotating helicopter that must be carefully manoeuvred through increasingly tight and tricky labyrinthine levels. Avoid the walls and obstacles, or you’ll lose precious time and lives, as you try to reach the goal. It starts simple but soon you’ll be facing moving pistons, floating spikes and all manner of dangers. Kuru Kuru Kururin is easy to pick up but impossible to put down!

PL.name: Kuru Kuru Kururin™
PL.description: Steady your hands and steel your nerves for one of the most challenging puzzle-action games ever created. Kuru Kuru Kururin puts you in control of a rotating helicopter that must be carefully manoeuvred through increasingly tight and tricky labyrinthine levels. Avoid the walls and obstacles, or you’ll lose precious time and lives, as you try to reach the goal. It starts simple but soon you’ll be facing moving pistons, floating spikes and all manner of dangers. Kuru Kuru Kururin is easy to pick up but impossible to put down!

PT.name: Kuru Kuru Kururin™
PT.description: Mãos firmes e nervos de aço! Em Kuru Kuru Kururin, um dos jogos de puzzle mais desafiantes alguma vez criados, controlas um helicóptero que tem de ser manobrado cuidadosamente através de níveis com passagens extremamente estreitas e labirintos intrigantes. Desvia-te de paredes e obstáculos para não perderes demasiado tempo nem vidas enquanto tentas chegar ao destino. Começar é fácil, mas rapidamente tens de enfrentar pistões em movimento, espinhos flutuantes e muitos outros perigos. Começar a jogar Kuru Kuru Kururin é fácil, o difícil é parar!

RU.name: Kuru Kuru Kururin™
RU.description: Kuru Kuru Kururin – самый захватывающий паззл из когда-либо созданных! В этой игре вам предстоит управлять вращающимся вертолетом и маневрировать в лабиринтах причудливой формы, а посему без молниеносной реакции и стальных нервов вам никак не обойтись. Двигаясь к заветной цели, избегайте столкновения со стенами и препятствиями, чтобы не потерять драгоценное время и силы. Легкое начало игры не должно вас обмануть — очень скоро на вашем пути появятся движущиеся поршни, летающие шипы и прочие неприятности. Освоив главные премудрости игры, вы уже не сможете отложить ее в сторону!

SE.name: Kuru Kuru Kururin™
SE.description: Steady your hands and steel your nerves for one of the most challenging puzzle-action games ever created. Kuru Kuru Kururin puts you in control of a rotating helicopter that must be carefully manoeuvred through increasingly tight and tricky labyrinthine levels.
